cause.description:
UrbanU.S seeks to develop solutions to various issues in an attempt to energize Baton Rouge’s many diverse communities towards productive reform. The organization design is to create a politically collaborative effort including professionals, laborers, parents, politicians, religious leaders, students, teachers, subject experts, etc. The information and ideas presented at each forum will equip Baton Rouge citizens with knowledge to challenge their elected officials, community leaders, etc., to move towards changes minus bureaucracy.
1. Initiate constructive dialogue towards productive reform of Baton Rouge's most critical issues.
2. Pressure community leaders to address the aforementioned issues with dedication and followthrough.
3. Hold each citizen, whether elected official or not, accountable for creating positive change in Baton Rouge's diverse community.
cause.mission: To initiate constructive dialogue on the numerous issues affecting Baton Rouge and provide a forum for critical thinking and solutions in which to solve/address each issue.
cause.name: UrbanU.S
